title: Exploring Sociocultural Issues in Culture and Instructional Design Technology (IDT): Application in Mathematical Education Contexts

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts, experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Enhancing mathematics instructional design capabilities in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, considering cultural diversity

learning_goals: Learners can explain principles of mathematics instructional design that account for diverse cultural backgrounds.
Learners can apply methods to analyze sociocultural issues through survey-based research.
Learners can implement culturally responsive mathematics education designs through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
